# Badge - &lt;st-badge&gt;

Badges scale to match the size of the immediate parent element by using relative font sizing and em units.

## Examples

```html
<st-badge variant="primary">Primary</st-badge>

<st-badge variant="secondary">Secondary</st-badge>

<st-badge variant="success">Success</st-badge>

<st-badge variant="danger">Danger</st-badge>

<st-badge variant="warning">Warning</st-badge>

<st-badge variant="info">Info</st-badge>

<st-badge variant="light">Light</st-badge>

<st-badge variant="dark">Dark</st-badge>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description      | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `variant` | `variant` | The visual style of the badge | `string` | `undefined` |
